scripts.ios:pod-install: bundle install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install
scripts.purge: yarn purge:android; yarn purge:ios; yarn purge:js
scripts.purge:js: rm -rf node_modules; yarn cache clean; watchman watch-del-all
scripts.purge:android: (cd android && ./gradlew --stop && ./gradlew clean); rm -rf android/.gradle android/build android/app/build
scripts.purge:ios: pod cache clean --all; rm -rf Gemfile.lock ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock ios/build ios/.xcode.env.local
